org.apache.bval.util

Class Exceptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.bval.util.Exceptions

  • public class Exceptions
extends Object
    Utility class for sundry Exception-related tasks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Exceptions.FormatArgs
      Callback interface that collects format arguments in conditional raise* method variants.

      • causeOf

        public static Throwable causeOf(Throwable t)
